[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/misc/grinder.c

To set a maximum amount of an object that can be ground at once. If left with the default value of 0, there is no maximum amount.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/container.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h
